name: Swedish General Animal Protection Association
obverse: Bust of Oscar II facing left.
obverse_inscriptions: OSCAR II SVERIGES OCH NORGES KONUNG.
reverse: A wreath enclosing the name of the award recipient. Pearls surround the edge of the reverse.
description: This award medal was first created in 1882. This particular medal was awarded to Johan W. Östergren in 1904.
